recipes.title: Tiramisu
steps: Dip ladyfingers in coffee and arrange in dish.
Whip mascarpone, sugar, and egg yolks.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook the spaghetti until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with cheese.
Toss the spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
